nodes.documentation:
@title Initializable
 * @dev Helper contract to support initializer functions. To use it, replace
the constructor with a function that has the `initializer` modifier.
WARNING: Unlike constructors, initializer functions must be manually
invoked. This applies both to deploying an Initializable contract, as well
as extending an Initializable contract via inheritance.
WARNING: When used with inheritance, manual care must be taken to not invoke
a parent initializer twice, or ensure that all initializers are idempotent,
because this is not dealt with automatically as with constructors.
nodes.name: Initializable

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Contract instance has already been initialized"

arguments.value: Contract instance has already been initialized

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Contract instance has already been initialized"

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to use in the initializer function of a contract.
nodes.name: initializer

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns true if and only if the function is running in the constructor
nodes.name: isConstructor
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: initialize

nodes.documentation: @return the address of the owner.
nodes.name: owner

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.
nodes.name: isOwner
renounceOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: _transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Managable constructor sets the original `manager` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: initialize

nodes.documentation: @return the address of the manager.
nodes.name: manager

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner or manager.
nodes.name: onlyManagerOrOwner

nodes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner or manager of the contract.
nodes.name: isManagerOrOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newManager.
@param newManager The address to transfer management to.
nodes.name: transferManagement

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "_from must be a user account managed by Numerai"

arguments.value: _from must be a user account managed by Numerai

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "_from must be a user account managed by Numerai"

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if the address does not match the required conditions.
nodes.name: isUser

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "User account relay has been disabled"

arguments.value: User account relay has been disabled

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "User account relay has been disabled"

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called after the relay is disabled.
